page.title: 01OVERVIEW
page.content: {Beacon Fell Country Park/Barns Fold The twelve square kilometres consist chiefly of intensively managed grassland used for the rearing of beef and dairy cattle and sheep. There are a few pigs and poultry are kept for domestic use. This is a sparsely populated area and many of those who live here work outside the block. Because it is very picturesque (verdant, rolling countryside intersected by hedgerows,sandstone walls and streams and dotted with small copses and ponds), it attracts many tourists throughout the year. Parts of the area are used for recreational purposes and of these the most significant is Beacon Fell Country Park at the extreme west of the block.
